mapper.select: select u.name,u.phone_number,u.size,u.email_alarm from user u where access_token =#{access_token} is not null and no = #{no} is not null
mapper.insert: insert into user(name, access_token, phone_number, size,point,email_alarm,zipcode,address,address_detail,login_type, reg_datetime,last_login_datetime,profile_img,updated_datetime) values (#{name}, #{access_token}, #{phone_number}, #{size}, #{point}, #{email_alarm}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{login_type}, now(), #{last_login_datetime}, #{profile_img,typeHandler=JsonObjectTypeHandler}, now());
